abstract: The Suunto X10 watch hides a G.P.S. unit, stopwatch, compass, barometer and altimeter into a package not much bigger than 007’s favorite Omega.
snippet: The Suunto X10 watch hides a G.P.S. unit, stopwatch, compass, barometer and altimeter into a package not much bigger than 007’s favorite Omega.
lead_paragraph: While the chunky Suunto X10 might not go well with a tuxedo, James Bond would still love it. The watch hides a Global Positioning System unit, stopwatch, compass, barometer and altimeter into a package not much bigger than 007’s favorite Omega.

headline.main: For the Next Global Mission (or Hike in the Woods), a Watch Loaded With Gadgetry
headline.print_headline: For the Next Global Mission (or Hike in the Woods), a Watch Loaded With Gadgetry
